sentences.sContent: Lucky for him, his alibi is watertight.
sentences.sCn: 算他走运，不在犯罪现场的证据无懈可击。

sentences.sContent: Unless the ban is watertight, EU laws will overturn it.
sentences.sCn: 这条禁令除非是十分严密，否则会被欧盟法律推翻。

synos.tran: 水密的；[建]不漏水的；无懈可击的

trans.tranCn: 不漏水的, 无懈可击的
trans.tranOther: an argument, plan etc that is watertight is made very carefully so that people cannot find any mistakes in it
